title: Full-Time Swordsman
summary: Full-Time Swordsman Manhua In an era when online games merge with reality, Lin Jichen, the number one cultivator in “Eight Wastelands” and the peak player in the realm of enlightenment, died due to the betrayal of his lover and brother. However, God will never die, and Lin Jichen was reborn and returned to the day before the server of “Eight Wastelands” was launched. After resurrecting his life, he resolutely gave up the law and followed the sword, used the sword to cut out the future and rewrite his destiny! It also allows him to stand out from the crowd before the game merges into reality! 全职剑修, Quan Zhi Jian Xiu
